card.name: Joshua Sweet - The Doctor
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Flavor: "Heading out into the Inklands? Come on back if you need patching up."
"Welcome to the Inklands."

cards.card:
"Card_Variants": "(enchanted placeholder)" Kida - Protector of Atlantis Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Kida.) Perhaps We Can Save Our Future - When you play this character all characters get -3※ until the start of your next turn.
Character Floodborn • Hero • Princess Amber Yes 5 Shift 3 3 3/5 5 2 "She has been chosen. - King Kashekim Nedakh"
INK 2

card.name: Lucky - The 15th Puppy
card.text: Good As New - ↷: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put each character card with cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Puppy Love - Whenever this character quests if you have 4 or more other characters in play your other characters get +1◆ this turn.

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Musical Artist
card.text: Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.) Entourage - Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Her musical talents are off the charts!"

card.name: Miss Bianca - Rescue Aid Society Agent
card.text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

prop.Flavor: "Our society has never failed to answer a call for help. -Mr. Chairman"
"This is simple Snoops! I want that lore! The one that shines like a diamond! -Madame Medusa"

card.name: Nani - Protective Sister
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Flavor: "Let me handle this Lilo."
"Boy look at those things go! Whaddya call 'em? Inkrunners? I wish I could fly like that."

card.name: Patch - Intimidating Pup
card.text: Bark - ↷: Chosen character gets -2※ until the start of your next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Just like Thunderbolt he'll stand up to any bad guy."

card.name: Perdita - Devoted Mother
card.text: Come Along Children - When you play this character and whenever she quests you may play a character with cost 2 or less from your discard for free.

prop.Flavor: "Her pups will follow her anywhere."

card.name: Piglet - Pooh Pirate Captain
card.text: And I'm The Captain! - While you have 2 or more other characters in play this character gets +2◆.

prop.Flavor: "Ahoy! There's lore out there and I'm g-gonna find it!"

card.name: Pluto - Determined Defender
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Pluto.) Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) Guard Dog - At the start of your turn remove up to 3 damage from this character.

card.name: Pluto - Friendly Pooch
card.text: Good Dog - ↷: You pay 1⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "He just can't wait for new friends to arrive!"

card.name: Pongo - Determined Father
card.text: Twilight Bark - Once per turn you may pay 2⬡ to reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card put it into your hand. Otherwise Put it on the bottom of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "We'll find our way. I know we will!"

card.name: Queen of Hearts - Wonderland Empress
card.text: All Ways Here Are My Ways - Whenever this character quests your other Villain characters get +1◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "The more of the Inklands she claims the more she wants."

card.name: Rolly - Hungry Pup
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "I'm hungry Mother. I really am."

card.name: Tinker Bell - Generous Fairy
card.text: Make A New Friend - When you play this character look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of our deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "Plenty of berries - and friendship - to go around."
"With Tink's upgrades in place Wendy took them to the skies to find the missing mermaid."

card.name: 99 Puppies
card.text: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Two four six plus three is nine plus two is 11 . . . -Roger"

card.name: Boss's Orders
card.text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "Snoops! I know you can look harder! Find me that lore! -Madame Medusa"

card.name: Heal What Has Been Hurt
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Let your power shine Make the clock reverse . . ."

card.name: Quick Patch
card.text: Remove up to 3 damage from chosen location

prop.Flavor: "Good as new! Well almost."

card.name: The Bare Necessities
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.

prop.Flavor: "Forget about your worries and your strife. . . ."

card.name: Cleansing Rainwater
card.text: Ancient Power - Banish this item: Remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

prop.Flavor: "Rainwater lands as stone melts and dragons fly again."

card.name: Heart of Atlantis
card.text: Life Giver - ↷: You pay 2⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "It's what's keeping you - all of Atlantis - alive! -Milo Thatch"

card.name: Wildcat's Wrench
card.text: Rebuild - ↷: Remove up to 2 damage from chosen location.

prop.Flavor: "The right tool makes all the difference."
"The mermaids told Peter they'd seen some items floating by several days earlier but they were more concerned that one of their sisters had gone missing."

card.name: Pride Lands - Pride Rock
card.text: We Are All Connected - Characters get +2⛨️ while here. Lion Home - If you have a Prince or King character here you pay 1⬡ less to play characters.

card.name: Tiana's Palace - Jazz Restaurant
card.text: Night Out - Characters can't be challenged while here.

prop.Flavor: "In New Orleans dreams can come true."

card.name: Alice - Tea Alchemist
card.text: Curiouser And Curiouser - ↷: Exert chosen opposing character and all other opposing characters with the same name.

prop.Flavor: "With the right tea leaves and a little magic she creates the perfect cup for any party guest."

card.name: Chernabog's Followers - Creatures of Evil
card.text: Restless Souls - Whenever this character quests you may banish them to draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Let chaos reign."

card.name: Diablo - Faithful Pet
card.text: Looking For Aurora - Whenever you play a character named Maleficent you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "With a little ink-enhanced magic nothing escapes his sight."

card.name: Genie - Supportive Friend
card.text: Three Wishes - Whenever this character quests you may shuffle this card into your deck to draw 3 cards.

prop.Flavor: "Right here direct from the lamp right here for your very much wish fulfillment."

card.name: Hydros - Ice Titan
card.text: Blizzard - ↷: Exert chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Freeze Zeus!"

card.name: Iago - Pretty Polly
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Your majesty certainly has a way with dumb animals. -Jafar"

card.name: Jafar - Lamp Thief
card.text: I Am Your Master Now - When you play this character look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

prop.Flavor: "I will rule as far as the eye can see."

cards.card:
"Card_Variants": "(enchanted placeholder)" Jafar - Striking Illusionist Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Power Beyond Measure - During your turn while this character is exerted whenever you draw a card gain 1 lore.
Character Floodborn • Villain • Sorcerer Amethyst Yes 7 Shift 5 Evasive 4 4/5 5 1

card.name: Lena Sabrewing - Rebellious Teenager
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "Born from the shadows. Saved by friendship."

card.name: Magic Broom - Dancing Duster
card.text: Power Clean - When you play this character if you have a Sorcerer character in play you may exert chosen opposing character. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Super-smooth tidiness."

card.name: Magic Broom - Swift Cleaner
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) Clean This Clean That - When you play this character you may shuffle all Broom cards from your discard into your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Super-speedy tidiness."

card.name: Magic Broom - The Big Sweeper
card.text: Clean Sweep - While this character is at a location it gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "Super-sized tidiness."

card.name: Magic Carpet - Flying Rug
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Find The Way - ↷: Move a character of yours to a location for free.

prop.Flavor: "Carpet and I can swoop in grab the lore and be back before anyone knows it! -Aladdin"
"Feed my power Dark Eclipse. Free my form from the abyss. Dormant magic now unchain the Shadow Queen be whole again!"

card.name: Magica De Spell - The Midas Touch
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.) All Mine - Whenever this character quests gain lore equal to the cost of one of your items in play.

prop.Flavor: "I can feel my powers growing the closer I get to Scrooge's precious dime!"

card.name: Magica De Spell - Thieving Sorceress
card.text: Telekinesis - ↷: Return chosen item with cost equal to or less than this character's ※ to its player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "Do you know what I call this? A good start!"

cards.card:
"Card_Variants": "(enchanted placeholder)" Maleficent - Mistress of All Evil Dark Knowledge - Whenever this character quests you may draw a card. Divination - During your turn whenever you draw a card you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.
Character Storyborn • Villain • Sorcerer Amethyst Yes 5 2 2/3 3 2
INK 2

card.name: Mama Odie - Voice of Wisdom
card.text: Listen To Your Mama Now - Whenever this character quests you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "That's the way to give it what it needs Juju!"

card.name: Pua - Potbellied Buddy
card.text: Always There - When this character is banished you may shuffle this card into your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Always ready to lend a hand . . . er snout."

card.name: Rafiki - Mystical Fighter
card.text: Challenger +3 (While challenging this character gets +3※.) Ancient Skills - Whenever he challenges a Hyena character this character takes no damage from the challenge.

prop.Flavor: "Mind the stick!"

card.name: Stratos - Tornado Titan
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Cyclone - ↷: Gain lore equal to the number of Titan characters you have in play.

prop.Flavor: "Blow Zeus away!"
"It rages through the forest Wings spread wide with flame Spring sings its ancient chorus And green renews its claim"
"A cobweb's strand to hold her fast An eagle's eye to see her well Sands of time to steal her past Thus I cast my magic spell!"

card.name: Treasure Guardian - Protector of the Cave
card.text: Who Disturbs MY Slumber? - This character can't challenge or quest unless it is at a location.

prop.Flavor: "Only one may enter here."

card.name: Ursula - Sea Witch
card.text: You're Too Late - Whenever this character quests chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "The secret contract has already been written"

card.name: Bestow a Gift
card.text: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "From magic ink I call this gift. Fly my minion thy wings be swift! -Maleficent"

card.name: It Calls Me
card.text: (A character with cost 1 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Draw a card. Then choose up to 3 cards from chosen opponent's discard and shuffle them into their deck.

prop.Flavor: "I am everything I've learned and more"

card.name: Last-Ditch Effort
card.text: Exert chosen opposing character. Then chosen character of yours gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2※ when challenging.)

prop.Flavor: "I got your back."

card.name: The Boss is on a Roll
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the top of the bottom of your deck in any order. Gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Go ahead! Make your choice!"

card.name: The Lamp
card.text: Good Or Evil - Banish this item: If you have a character named Jafar in play draw 2 cards. If you have a character named Genie in play return chosen character with cost 4 or less to their players hand.

card.name: The Sorcerer's Hat
card.text: Incredible Energy - ↷ 1⬡: Name a card then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card put that card into your hand. Otherwise put it on the top of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Minnie approached it carefully. Whoever had placed it here might have prepared traps."
"An eerie quiet surrounds the castle - but beware of the dangerous occupant within."

card.name: The Queen's Castle - Mirror Chamber
card.text: Using The Mirror - At the start of your turn for each character you have here you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Those who visit the mirror can choose their question - but not the answer."

card.name: The Sorcerer's Tower - Wondrous Workspace
card.text: Broom Closet - Your characters named Magic Broom may move here for free. Magical Power - Characters get +1◆ while here.

prop.Flavor: "Everything you need to make some magic."

card.name: Cubby - Mighty Lost Boy
card.text: The Bear - Whenever this character moves to a location he gets +3※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "With Peter holding off Hook Cubby did what he does best: break stuff."

card.name: Cursed Merfolk - Ursula's Handiwork
card.text: Poor Souls - Whenever this character is challenged each opponent chooses and discards a card.

prop.Flavor: "Now it's happened once or twice someone couldn't pay the price . . . -Ursula"

card.name: Don Karnage - Prince of Pirates
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "You didn't expect to find me here did you? Well neither did I."

card.name: Flotsam - Riffraff
card.text: Eerie Pair - Your characters named Jetsam get +3※.

prop.Flavor: "Ursula needs lore to complete her plan. . . ."

card.name: Friar Tuck - Priest of Nottingham
card.text: You Thieving Scoundrel - When you play this character the player or players with the most cards in their hand chooses and discards a card.

prop.Flavor: "Get outta my church! Out! Out! Out!"

card.name: Helga Sinclair - Femme Fatale
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Helga Sinclair.) This Changes Everything - Whenever this character quests you may deal 3 damage to chosen damaged character.

card.name: Helga Sinclair - Vengeful Partner
card.text: Nothing Personal - When this character is challenged and banished banish the challenging character.

prop.Flavor: "You said we were in this together!"

card.name: Jetsam - Riffraff
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) Eerie Pair - Your characters named Flotsam gain Ward.

prop.Flavor: "There must be powerful lore here very powerful."

card.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Tough Guy
card.text: Skysurfing - When you play this character you may return chosen opposing character with 2※ or less to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "It's been fun guys but I got to be going. Yahoooo!"

card.name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke - Cunning Mercenary
card.text: Well Now You Know - When you play this character chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.) Thanks For Volunteering - Whenever one of your other characters is banished each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Believe me studying gibberish really can take you places!"

card.name: Milo Thatch - King of Atlantis
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.) Take Them By Surprise - When this character is banished return all opposing characters to their player's hands.

prop.Flavor: "You don't know what you're tampering with."

cards.card:
"Card_Variants": "(enchanted placeholder)" Morph - Space Goo Mimicry - You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.
Character Storyborn • Ally • Alien Emerald Yes 2 Shift 2 2/1 1 1 "You jiggle-headed blob of mischief! -John Silver"
INK 2

card.name: Peter Pan - Lost Boy Leader
card.text: I Came To Listen To The Stories - Once per turn when this character moves to a location gain lore equal to that location's ◆.

prop.Flavor: "The Illumineers needed someone to find a missing spellbook and Peter was the first to volunteer."

card.name: Prince John - Phony King
card.text: Collect Taxes - Whenever this character quests each opponent with more lore than you loses 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Too late to be known as John the First he's sure to be known as John the Worst! -Sheriff of Nottingham"
"Some days it's nice to let the river do the running."

card.name: Shenzi - Hyena Pack Leader
card.text: I'll Handle This - While this character is at a location she gets +3※. What's The Hurry? - While this character is at a location whenever she challenges another character you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Why not stick around for dinner?"

card.name: Sir Hiss - Aggravating Asp
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Prince John isn't the only one collecting taxes!"

card.name: Skippy - Energetic Rabbit
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "Even the bravest outlaw knows when to lie low."
"Point him in the right direction and he'll do the rest"

card.name: Stitch - Covert Agent
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Hide - While this character is at a location he gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "For such a flashy dresser he sure is hard to spot."

card.name: Ursula - Deceiver
card.text: You'll Never Even Miss It - When you play this character chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a song card of your choice.

cards.card:
"Card_Variants": "(enchanted placeholder)" Ursula - Deceiver of All What A Deal - Whenever this character sings a song you may play that song again from your discard for free then put it on the bottom of your deck.
Character Dreamborn • Villain • Sorcerer Emerald Yes 3 2 2/3 3 1 "I don't want much - just the most powerful lore!"
INK 2

card.name: Wildcat - Mechanic
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Disassemble - ↷: Banish chosen item.

prop.Flavor: "I can take anything apart in under 5 minutes!"

card.name: Zazu - Steward of the Pride Lands
card.text: It's Time To Go! - While this character is at a location he gets +1◆.

prop.Flavor: "I'd be lyin' if I said I ran the place but welcome to the Pride Lands all the same!"

card.name: Has Set My Heaaaaaaart . . .
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Banish chosen item.

prop.Flavor: "He's not real smart And yet he's touched my little cowhide heart"

card.name: I Will Find My Way
card.text: (A character with cost X or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen character of yours gets +2※ this turn. They may move to a location for free.

prop.Flavor: "I would go most anywhere To feel like I belong"

card.name: Strike a Good Match
card.text: (A character with cost X or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Draw 2 cards then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: "Please bring honor to us Please bring honor to us all"

card.name: Airfoil
card.text: I Got To Be Going - ↷: If you've played 2 or more actions this turn draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Discovered in the lost Sea Duck it looked good as new."

card.name: Robin's Bow
card.text: Forest's Gift - ↷: Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character or location. A Bit Of A Lark - Whenever a character of yours named Robin Hood quests you may ready this item.

prop.Flavor: "The forest always provides just what you need. -Robin Hood"

card.name: Starlight Vial
card.text: Efficient Energy - ↷: You pay 2⬡ less for the next action you play this turn. Trap - 2⬡ Banish this item: Draw 2 cards then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: "In the wrong hands this vial of magic could be disastrous."
"They say the ol' place is haunted or bewitched or some such fiddle-faddle. -Colonel"

card.name: Fang - River City
card.text: Surrounded By Water - Characters gain Ward and Evasive while here. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

prop.Flavor: "A nation protected by fierce assassins and their even fiercer cats."

card.name: Kuzco's Palace - Home of the Emperor
card.text: City Walls - Whenever a character is challenged and banished while here banish the challenging character.

prop.Flavor: "Sure it's a little small but also it DOESN'T HAVE A POOL! -Kuzco"

card.name: Ariel - Adventurous Collector
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Inspiring Voice - Whenever you play a song chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Shipwrecks are great places to find lore - and hide from sharks!"

card.name: Billy Bones - Keeper of the Map

prop.Flavor: "He's after me chest that fiendish cyborg and his band of cutthroats."

cards.card:
"Card_Variants": "(enchanted placeholder)" Captain Hook - Master Swordsman Nemesis - During your turn whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn. Man-To-Man - Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.
Character Dreamborn • Villain • Pirate • Captain Ruby Yes 5 Evasive 5 5/4 4 1
INK 2

card.name: Della Duck - Unstoppable Mom
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "I survived the moon. How tough could the flooded Inklands be?"

card.name: HeiHei - Accidental Explorer
card.text: Mindless Wandering - Once per turn when this character moves to a location each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Considering the coconut."

card.name: Hydra - Deadly Serpent
card.text: Watch The Teeth - Whenever this character is dealt damage deal that much damage to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "More heads are better than one."

card.name: Jim Hawkins - Space Traveler
card.text: This Is It! - When you play this character you may play a location with cost 4 or less for free. Take The Helm - Whenever you play a location this character may move there for free.

prop.Flavor: "You're gonna rattle the stars you are. -John Silver"
"If you want a bigger reward you've got to take bigger risks."

card.name: Kakamora - Menacing Sailor
card.text: Plunder - When you play this character each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "There's a bunch more where he came from."

card.name: Madame Medusa - The Boss
card.text: That Terrible Woman - When you play this character banish chosen opposing character with 3※ or less.

prop.Flavor: "Finding lore will be as easy as taking candy from children."

card.name: Maui - Soaring Demigod
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.) In Ma Belly - Whenever a character of yours named HeiHei quests this character gets +1◆ and loses Reckless this turn.

prop.Flavor: "You got any more of those chickens hanging around?"

card.name: Maui - Whale
card.text: This Mission Is Cursed - This character can't ready at the start of your turn. I Got Your Back - 2⬡: Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of the turn.

prop.Flavor: "Always ready to make a splash."

card.name: Milo Thatch - Spirited Scholar
card.text: I'm Your Man! - While this character is at a location he gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "My grandpa never told me about this place!"

card.name: Moana - Born Leader
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.) Welcome To My Boat - Whenever this character quests while at a location ready all other characters here they can't quest for the rest of this turn.

card.name: Moana - Undeterred Voyager
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "No fire or storm will keep her from her goal."
"Nutsy button your beak. -Trigger"

card.name: Peter Pan - Never Land Hero
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) Over Here Tink - While you have a character named Tinker Bell in play this character gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "With Peter plans often meant diving headlong into danger."

card.name: Peter Pan - Pirate's Bane
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Peter Pan.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) You're Next! - Whenever he challenges a Pirate character this character takes no damage from the challenge.

card.name: Prince Eric - Expert Helmsman
card.text: Surprise Maneuver - When this character is banished you may banish chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "The storm came out of nowhere forcing Eric to turn back before he reached the mysterious structure at the edge of Lorcana."

card.name: Scroop - Backstabber
card.text: Brute - While this character has damage he gets +3※.

prop.Flavor: "Always keep him in front of you. And downwind if possible."
"He'll join the hunt for lore after he's had a quick snack."

card.name: Slightly - Lost Boy
card.text: The Fox - If you have a character named Peter Pan in play you pay 1⬡ less to play this character. Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Pirates sure are easy to trick!"

card.name: Stitch - Little Rocket
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "Who thought giving him power armor was a good idea?! -Nani"

card.name: Trigger - Not-So-Sharp Shooter
card.text: Old Betsy - Your characters named Nutsy get +1◆.

prop.Flavor: "Criminently Trigger! Point that peashooter the other way. -Sheriff of Nottingham"
"Finding lore is a lot easier when you have a grappling hook!"

card.name: Divebomb
card.text: Banish one of your characters with Reckless to banish chosen character with less ※ than that character.

card.name: I've Got A Dream
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Ready chosen character of yours at a location. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. Gain lore equal to that location's ◆.

prop.Flavor: "Tor would like to quit and be a florist Gunther does interior design"

card.name: On Your Feet! Now!
card.text: Ready all your characters and deal 1 damage to each of them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Catch them! Before they get away!"

card.name: Voyage
card.text: Move up to 2 characters of yours to the same location for free.

prop.Flavor: "We were voyagers! Why'd we stop?" - Moana

card.name: Maui's Fish Hook
card.text: It's Maui Time! - If you have a character named Maui in play you may use this item's Shapeshift ability for free. Shapeshift - ↷ 2⬡: Choose one: • Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.) • Chosen character gets +3※ this turn.

card.name: Sumerian Talisman
card.text: Source Of Magic - During your turn whenever one of your characters is banished in a challenge you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Summoned spirit from the dark Show thyself before this arc." -Lena Sabrewing
"Welcome to Agrabah city of mystery of enchantment and the finest merchandise this side of the river." - Merchant

card.name: Jolly Roger - Hook's Ship
card.text: Look Alive You Swabs! - Characters gain Rush while here. (They can challenge the turn they're played.) All Hands On Deck! - Your Pirate characters may move here for free.

card.name: RLS Legacy - Solar Galleon
card.text: This Is Our Ship - Characters gain Evasive while here. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.) Heave Together Now - If you have a character here you pay 2⬡ less to move a character of yours here.

card.name: Audrey Ramirez - The Engineer
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) Spare Parts - Whenever this character quests ready one of your items.

prop.Flavor: "How'd you break this thing anyway?"

card.name: Captain Amelia - First in Command
card.text: Discipline - During your turn this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

prop.Flavor: "I've spotted a strange structure on the horizon. Hard to port helmsman!"

card.name: Dewey - Showy Nephew
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "I got it! I knew I could do it! Dewey for the win!"

card.name: Flintheart Glomgold - Lone Cheater
card.text: They'll Never See It Coming! - During your turn this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.

prop.Flavor: "Nobody tells Flintheart Glomgold what to do!"
"Ten thousand years will give you such a crick in the neck!"

card.name: Gramma Tala - Keeper of Ancient Stories
card.text: There Was Only Ocean - When you play this character look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "Listen with your whole heart and the ancestors will guide you."

cards.card:
"Card_Variants": "(enchanted placeholder)" Gramma Tala - Spirit of the Ocean Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Gramma Tala.) Do You Know Who You Are? - Whenever a card is put into your inkwell gain 1 lore.
Character Floodborn • Mentor Sapphire Yes 7 Shift 5 4 4/8 8 2 "She will always be with you no matter how far your journey takes you."
INK 2

card.name: Gyro Gearloose - Gadget Whiz
card.text: Now Try To Keep Up - ↷: Put an item card from your discard on the top of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Maybe the bulb tech will be less evil this time . . ."

card.name: Huey - Savvy Nephew
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.) Three Nephews - Whenever this character quests if you have characters named Dewey and Louie in play you may draw 3 cards.

prop.Flavor: "This looks like part of a larger crystal!"
"Hold up cuz. Why not sit back and enjoy some sweet beats?"

card.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Navigator
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Kit Cloudkicker.) Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

card.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Spunky Bear Cub
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "We totally took care of that thing you told us to do and definitely did not spend the day in Thebes ticketing chariots and stealing people's laundry."

card.name: Panic - Immortal Sidekick
card.text: Reporting for Duty - While this character is exerted if you have a character named pain in play your Villain characters can't be challenged.

prop.Flavor: "We absolutely took care of that thing boss. No problems just great."

card.name: Pegasus - Cloud Racer
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Pegasus.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Hop On! - When you play this character if you used Shift to play him your characters gain Evasive until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Pegasus - Gift for Hercules
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "His name is Pegasus. And he's all yours. . . ." - Zeus

card.name: Pete - Born to Cheat
card.text: I Clobber You! - Whenever this character quests while he has 5※ or more return chosen character with 2※ or less to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "Minnie: This is an outrage! Pete: No. It's my nefarious plan to steal the throne."

card.name: Prince Philip - Vanquisher of Foes
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Philip.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Swift and Sure - When you play this character banish all opposing damaged characters.

card.name: Prince Phillip - Warden of the Woods
card.text: Shining Beacon. You other Hero characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "He stands ready to protect his friends from any threat."

card.name: The Fates - Only One Eye
card.text: All Will Be Seen - When you play this character look at the top card of each opponent's deck.

prop.Flavor: "We know everything." - Lachesis

card.name: The Muses - Proclaimers of Heroes
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) The Gospel Truth - Whenever you play a song you may return chosen character with 2※ or less to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "They say that his arrangements are exquisite His composites and bouquets are so divine. But when the crowds try to come and visit There's always quite a fight to form a line."

card.name: Zeus - Mr. Lightning Bolts
card.text: Target Practice - Whenever a this character challenges another character he gets +※ equal to the ※ of chosen character this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Ha! Now watch your old man work!"

card.name: Dodge!
card.text: Chosen character gains Ward and Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

prop.Flavor: "Missed me you doggone bully!"

card.name: Make the Potion
card.text: Choose one: • Banish chosen item. • Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character

card.name: Under the Sea
card.text: Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may ↷ to sing this song for free.) Put all opposing characters with 2※ or less on the bottom of their player's decks in any order.

prop.Flavor: "Such wonderful things surround you"

card.name: Ursula's Trickery
card.text: Each opponent may choose and discard a card. For each opponent who doesn't you draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "How dare you double-cross me! Ursula shouted lunging at the other glimmer."

card.name: We Don't Talk About Bruno
card.text: (A character with cost X or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Return chosen character to their player's hand then that player discards a card at random.

prop.Flavor: "Your fate is sealed when your prophecy is read!"

card.name: Hidden Inkcaster
card.text: Fresh Ink - When you play this item draw a card. Unexpected treasure - All cards in your hand count as having ⏣.

prop.Flavor: "It looks like it's been here forever." - Flounder

card.name: Signed Contract
card.text: Fine Print - Whenever an opponent plays a song you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "I would love to help you of course but there's the little matter of the contract . . ." - Ursula

card.name: Vision Slab
card.text: Danger Revealed - At the start of your turn if an opposing character has damage gain 1 lore. Trapped! Damage counters can't be removed.

prop.Flavor: "Tio Bruno! What's happening to him? We have to help!" - Mirabel

card.name: Hidden Cove - Tranquil Haven
card.text: Revitalizing Waters - Characters get +1※ and +1⛨️ while here.

prop.Flavor: "Flounder this is perfect! I can't wait to explore it."

card.name: Ursula's Garden - Full of the Unfortunate
card.text: Abandon Hope - While you have an exerted character here opposing characters get -1◆.

card.name: Beast - Wounded
card.text: That Hurts!: This character enters play with 4 damage.

prop.Flavor: "It wasn't the severity of the wounds but the sickly substance that caused such unbearable pain."
"We must work together to heal the entangled."

card.name: Fa Zhou - Mulan's Father
card.text: War Injury: This character can't challenge. Head of The Household: ↷ - Ready chosen character named Mulan. She can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "I am ready to serve the Emperor."

card.name: Flynn Rider - Frenemy
card.text: Narrow Advantage: At the start of your turn if you have a character in play with more ※ than each opposing character gain 3 lore.

prop.Flavor: "You guys look busy-I'll just keep an eye on this lore for you."

card.name: Goofy - Super Goof
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) Super Peanut Powers: Whenever this character challenges another character gain 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Never underestimate the power of a Goof."

card.name: Hercules - Clumsy Kid
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "Nice catch Jerkules." -Village boy

card.name: Hercules - Daring Demigod
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "As silent as a shadow and faster than the wind: brave Khan the mightiest stallion."
"His training was unsurpassed but it was his courage that would see him through this fight."

card.name: Li Shang - Valorous General
card.text: Shift: Discard a character card (You may discard a character card to play this on top of one of your characters name Li Shang.) Lead the Charge: Your characters with 4※ or more get +1◆.

card.name: Lumiere - Fiery Friend
card.text: Fervent Address: Your other characters get +1※.

prop.Flavor: "The invaders are at out gates mes amis! It's time to show them what we're made of."

card.name: Mulan - Elite Archer
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.) Straight Shooter: When you play this character if you used Shift to play her she gets +3※ this turn. Triple Shot: During your turn whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge deal the same amount of damage to up to 2 other chosen characters.

card.name: Mulan - Enemy of Entanglement
card.text: Time To Shine: Whenever you play an action this character gets +2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Ursula's messengers fled leaving behind tendrils of dark ink."

card.name: Mulan - Injured Soldier
card.text: Battle Wound - This character enters play with 2 damage.

prop.Flavor: "She'll never give up"

card.name: Namaari - Heir of Fang
card.text: Two-Weapon Fighting: During your turn whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge you may deal the same amount of damage to another chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "He sent the eels away when they came with the sea witch's offer. He didn't need her help making trouble."

card.name: Noi - Acrobatic Baby
card.text: Fancy Footwork: Whenever you play an action this character takes no damage from challenge this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Fortune favors the bold-no matter how small."

card.name: Pegasus - Flying Steed
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "He zigs he zags - what else do ya need?" - Phil

card.name: Raya - Fierce Protector
card.text: Don't Cross Me: Whenever this character challenges another character gain 1 lore for each other damaged character you have in play.

prop.Flavor: "You're gonna fight an entire army?"

card.name: Raya - Guardian of the Dragon Gem
card.text: We Have Come Together: When you play this character ready chosen character of yours at a location. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "There are too many of them for me. But no for us."

card.name: Sisu - Daring Visitor
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Bring On The Heat!: When you play this character banish chosen opposing character with 1※ or less.

prop.Flavor: "Come on - what's the worst that can happen?"

card.name: Sisu - Emboldened Warrior
card.text: Surge of Power: This character gets +1※ for each card in opponents' hands.

prop.Flavor: "Sometimes the only way to fight the unimaginable is with the incredible."

card.name: Sisu - Empowered Sibling
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Sisu.) I Got This!: When you play this character banish all opposing characters with 2※ or less.

card.name: Tong - Survivor
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must attack each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "I too wish to join the fellowship of Druun butt-kickery."

card.name: Tuk Tuk - Lively Partner
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) On a Roll: When you play this character you may move him and one of your other characters to the same location for free. The other characters get +2※ this turn.

card.name: A Pirate's Life
card.text: Sing Together 6 (Any number of you or your teammates' characters with total cost 6 or more may ↷ to sing this song for free.) Each opponent loses 2 lore. You gain 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Give me a career as a buccaneer"

card.name: Be King Undisputed
card.text: (A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

prop.Flavor: "Respected saluted"

card.name: Brawl
card.text: Banish chosen character with 2※ or less.

prop.Flavor: "There are two ways to leave the Snuggly Duckling - the door or the window."

card.name: Imperial Proclamation
card.text: Call To The Front: Whenever one of your characters challenge another character you may pay 1⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "By order of the Emperor one man from every family must serve in the Imperial Army." - Chi Fu

card.name: Medallion Weights
card.text: Discipline And Strength: ↷ 2⬡ - Chosen character gets +2※ this turn. Whenever they challenge another character this turn you may draw a card.

card.name: The Plank
card.text: Walk!: 2⬡ Banish this item - Choose one: • Banish chosen Hero character. • Ready chosen Villain character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "It's a once-in-a-lifetime view."

card.name: Vitalisphere
card.text: Extract of Ruby: 1⬡ Banish this item - Chosen character gains Rush and gets +2※ this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

card.name: Snuggly Duckling - Disreputable Pub
card.text: Routine Ruckus: Whenever a character with 3※ or more challenge another character while here gain 1 lore. If the challenging character has 6※ or more gain 3 lore instead.

card.name: Training Grounds - Impossible Pillar
card.text: Strength of Mind: 1⬡ - Chosen character here gets +1※ this turn.

card.name: Anna - Braving the Storm
card.text: I Was Born Ready: If you have another Hero character in play this character gets +1◆.

prop.Flavor: "After talking to Olaf Anna marched into the unexpected storm to save Kristoff."

card.name: Anna - True-Hearted
card.text: Let Me Help You: Whenever this character quests your other Hero characters get +1◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Make sure you know what's truly important and be willing to fight for it."

card.name: Ariel - Treasure Collector
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) The Girl Who Has Everything: While you have more items in play than each opponent this character gets +2◆.

card.name: Aurora - Lore Guardian
card.text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.) Preserver: Opponents can't choose your items for abilities or effects. Royal Inventory: ↷ one of your items - Look at the top card of your deck and put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Aurora - Tranquil Princess
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "Her music fills the Illuminary's gardens with joy and light"

card.name: Dang Hu - Talon Chief
card.text: You Better Talk Fast: Your other Villain characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "You can find villainy in the most unexpected places."
"When far from home Mulan often thinks of her calming presence."

card.name: Flounder - Collector's Companion
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.) I'm Not a Guppy: If you have a character named Ariel in play you may pay 1⬡ less to play this character.

prop.Flavor: "Ariel Ariel! You won't believe what I found!"
"This neat little scheme has Ursula's tentacles all over it. That sneaky sea witch... Wait! I can use this. She can keep those obnoxious Illumineers busy while I roll out my own plan."

card.name: Hans - Noble Scoundrel
card.text: Royal Schemes: When you play this character if a Princess or Queen character is in play gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Hans was confident he could bring Anna to Ursula - all he needed was something of Kristoff's to lure her in."

card.name: Iduna - Caring Mother
card.text: Enduring Love: When this character is banished you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "Come my darling homeward bound When all is lost then all is found."

card.name: John Silver - Terror of the Realm

prop.Flavor: "Strange things be at the edge of the map: sea witches entangled glimmers and whatnot. I'll stay with me ship thank you."

card.name: Olaf - Carrot Enthusiast
card.text: Shift: Discard an item card (You may discard an item card to play this on top of one of your characters named Olaf.) Carrots All Around!: Whenever he quests each of your other characters gets +※ equal to this character's ※ this turn.

card.name: Olaf - Trusting Companion
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "Isn't this Kristoff's hat? If he went this way he'll be caught in that storm!"

card.name: Pascal - Inquisitive Pet
card.text: Colorful Tactics: When you play this character look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

prop.Flavor: "If you want to find something hidden get someone who's an expert at hiding."

card.name: Prince Phillip - Gallant Defender
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.) Best Defense: Whenever one of your characters is chosen for Support they gain Resist +1 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

card.name: Rapunzel - Appreciative Artist
card.text: Perceptive Partner: While you have a character named Pascal in play this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "Pascal! A new flower for the wall!"

card.name: Scuttle - Expert on Humans
card.text: let Me See: When you play this character look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "Wow. This is special. This is very very unusual."
"It may feel impossible but sometimes you just have to take the first step even before you're ready."

card.name: The Queen - Diviner
card.text: Consult the Spellbook: ↷ - Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item costs 3 or less you may play it for free instead and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Transformed Chef - Castle Stove
card.text: A Culinary Masterpiece: When you play this character remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "A good hot meal will set you right as rain." - Mrs. Potts

card.name: Triton - Champion of Atlantica
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Triton.) Imposing Presence: Opposing characters get -1※ for each location you have in play.

card.name: Triton - Discerning King
card.text: Consign to the Depths: ↷ Banish one of your items - Gain 3 lore.

prop.Flavor: "If this is the only way so be it."

card.name: Triton - Young Prince
card.text: Superior Swimmer: During your turn this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.) Keeper of Atlantica: Whenever one of your locations is banished you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "Some say he's easily distracted. They're not wrong..." - Raya

card.name: Dig a Little Deeper
card.text: Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may ↷ to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. Put 2 into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Glean
card.text: Banish chosen item. Its player gains 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "This could be just the thing I need to get my invention working."

card.name: Seldom All They Seem
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen character gets -3※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "I know you I walked with you once upon a dream"

card.name: Treasures Untold
card.text: (A character with cost 6 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Return up to 2 item cards from your discard into your hand.

prop.Flavor: "How many wonders can one cavern hold?"

card.name: Field of Ice
card.text: Icy Defense: Whenever your play a character they gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

card.name: Great Stone Dragon
card.text: Asleep: This item enters play exerted. Awaken: ↷ - Put a character card from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

card.name: Ice Block
card.text: Chilly Labor: ↷ - Chosen character gets -1※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Frozen ink can be harvested and processed to many useful ends."

card.name: Ariel's Grotto - A Secret Place
card.text: Treasure Trove: While you have 3 or more items in play this location gets +2◆.

card.name: Winter Camp - Medical Tent
card.text: Help the Wounded: Whenever a character quests while here remove up to 2 damage from them. If they're a Hero character remove up to 4 damage instead.

card.name: Aladdin - Brave Rescuer
card.text: Shift: Discard a location card (You may discard a location card to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.) Crashing Though: Whenever this character quests you may banish chosen item.

prop.Flavor: "How about we cut to the part where I make a quick escape and you yell after me? No? Can't say I didn't give you a chance."
"Looks like you got some big feelings there buddy - let's stomp 'em out!" - Hades

card.name: Ariel - Determined Mermaid
card.text: I Want More: Whenever you play a song you may draw a card then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: "Everything she's ever wanted is almost in reach"

card.name: Ariel - Sonic Warrior
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Ariel.) Amplified Voice: Whenever you play a song you may pay 2⬡ to deal 3 damage to chosen character.

card.name: Beast - Thick-Skinned
card.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "He's even tougher than he looks."

card.name: Chi-Fu - Imperial Advisor
card.text: Overly Cautious: While this character has no damage he gets +2◆.

prop.Flavor: "You there! Keep that fighting away from here! It is imperative that I write to the Emperor."

card.name: Chien-Po - Imperial Soldier
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard first if able.)

card.name: Donald Duck - Buccaneer
card.text: Boarding Party: During your turn whenever this character banishes a character in a challenge your other characters get +1◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Nobody stands a change against the daring duck of the high seas!"

card.name: Hercules - Beloved Hero
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges on of your characters must chose one with Bodyguard if able.) Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1)

card.name: LeFou - Opportunistic Flunky
card.text: I Learned From the Best: During your turn you may play this character for free if an opposing character was banished in a challenge this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Immovable as a mountain and fierce as a dragon- the Empire's finest warrior."

card.name: Ling - Imperial Soldier
card.text: Full of Spirit: Your Hero characters get +1※.

prop.Flavor: "A good friend is handy in a fight."

card.name: Luisa Madrigal - Rock of the Family
card.text: I'm the Strong One: While you have another character in play this character gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "There's no way Ursula's creatures are getting to that donkey."

card.name: Magic Broom - Aerial Cleaner
card.text: Winged for a Day: During your turn this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

prop.Flavor: "It spends its days keeping the treasured glimmers in the Hall of Lorcana sparkling clean."

card.name: Magic Broom - Brigade Commander
card.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) Army of Brooms: This character gets +2※ for each other character named Magic Broom you have in play

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Playful Sorcerer
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) Sweep Away: When you play this character deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Standard Bearer
card.text: Stand Strong: When you play this character chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They gain +2※ while challenging.)

prop.Flavor: "He set the standard for intrepid adventurers everywhere."
"Maybe what I really wanted was to prove I could do things right so when I looked in a mirror I'd see someone worthwhile."

card.name: Philoctetes - No-Nonsense Instructor
card.text: You Gotta Stay Focused: Your Hero characters gain Challenger +1 (They get +1※ while challenging) Shameless Promoter: Whenever you play a Hero character gain 1 lore.

card.name: Piglet - Sturdy Swordsman
card.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) Not So Small Anymore: While you have no cards in your hand this character can challenge ready characters.

card.name: Rajah - Royal Protector
card.text: Steady Gaze: While you have no cards in your hand characters with cost 4 or less can't challenge this character.

prop.Flavor: "As regal as his namesake and just as powerful"

card.name: Raya - Unstoppable Force
card.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging this character gets +2※.) Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.) You Gave it Your Best: During your turn whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge you may draw a card.

card.name: Yao - Imperial Soldier
card.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging this character gets +2※)

prop.Flavor: "I'm gonna hit you so hard it'll make your ancestors dizzy."

card.name: Avalanche
card.text: Deal 1 damage to each opposing character. You may banish chosen location.

prop.Flavor: "A little snow never hurt anyone. A big rock however"

card.name: I Find 'Em I Flatten 'Em
card.text: (A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Banish all items.

prop.Flavor: "I don't ask how hard the work is Got a rough indestructible surface"

card.name: One Last Hope
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. If a Hero character is chosen they may also challenge ready character this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

card.name: The Mob Song
card.text: Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may ↷ to sing this song for free.) Deal 3 damage to up to 3 chosen characters and/or locations.

card.name: Triton's Decree
card.text: Each opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 2 damage to them.

prop.Flavor: "Ursula's foul creatures are not welcome in my kingdom!"

card.name: Fortisphere
card.text: Resourceful: When you play this item you may draw a card. Extract of Steel: 1⬡ Banish this item - Chosen character of yours gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

card.name: Imperial Bow
card.text: Within Range: ↷ 1⬡ - Chosen Hero character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive this turn. (They get +2※ while challenging . They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

card.name: RLS Legacy's Cannon
card.text: BA-BOOM!: ↷ 2⬡ Discard a card - Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location.

prop.Flavor: "So help me I'll use the ship's cannons to blast ya all to the kingdom come! -John Silver"

card.name: The Wall - Border Fortress
card.text: Protect The Realm: While you have an exerted character here your other locations can't be challenged.

card.name: Thebes - The Big Olive
card.text: If You Can Make it Here: During your turn whenever a character banishes another character in a challenge while here gain 2 lore.
